attributes.action: Allow Indoor Play Centres to stay open in tier 3 Areas of Covid Lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
With the new tier boundaries set out for the coming weeks. Indoor Activity Centres have been hit in tier 3 leaving pre school children to suffer! There are no proven cases that children have passed on the disease having been to a centre.  Families and business owners are going to suffer. These centres are also the back bone for Sen Children  as a safe environment for play and inter action 
Gyms Hairdressing Saloons Etc can open 
WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT FOR US TO STAY OPEN TO ALLOW KIDS TO PLAY.
attributes.background:
Allow all indoor activity centres to stay open Toddlers and babies  need to learn social skills. Recently published theres has been huge findings on the forgotten early years child that they need interaction with others 
No justifiable reason has been given as to why they have to remain closed

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561997
